授業方法: Classes will be interactive and group-work based, with some language and skills guidance from the teacher. Learners are expected to participate actively in all tasks to gain the maximum benefit to their spoken English skills. There will be a range of spoken tasks, including group discussions, presentations, supported by reading & listening tasks. Materials could include a selection from the textbook as well as additional materials distributed in class and on LUNA. Text Book selection for semester 2 (Autumn) will be based on performance in semester 1 (Spring).

トピック.授業計画1: This course will use a range of in-class tasks to help develop learners’ spoken fluency as well as ability to deliver more effective presentations & use a range of skills to interact more successfully in group discussions/conversations.
トピック.授業外学習2: Learners will be expected to completed homework tasks from the course text (once finalized) to review and prepare for classes each week.
